A minimalist DAG theme

A minimalist DAG theme

theme_dag_blank(base_size = 12, base_family = "", ...)

Arguments

base_size

base font size
base_family

base font family
...

additional arguments passed to theme()

Examples

ggdag(m_bias()) + theme_dag_blank()
